sqlMap.select:
$pageSQLA$ SELECT * FROM RP_REPORT T
T.RP_SREPORTUNITNAME LIKE '%'||#searchA#||'%'
T.RP_SYEAR LIKE '%'||#searchB#||'%'
T.RP_SPERDEPARTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchC#||'%'
T.RP_SPROJECTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchD#||'%'
T.RP_SPERSON LIKE '%'||#searchE#||'%'
T.RP_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchF$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
T.RP_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchG$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY RP_SREPLYDATE DESC $pageSQLB$

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM RP_REPORT T
T.RP_SREPORTUNITNAME LIKE '%'||#searchA#||'%'
T.RP_SYEAR LIKE '%'||#searchB#||'%'
T.RP_SPERDEPARTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchC#||'%'
T.RP_SPROJECTNAME LIKE '%'||#searchD#||'%'
T.RP_SPERSON LIKE '%'||#searchE#||'%'
T.RP_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchF$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
T.RP_SREPLYDATE >= to_date('$searchG$ 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
T.UD_SNO1 = #UD_SNO1:VARCHAR#
T.RP_SPROJECTNAME = #RP_SPROJECTNAME:VARCHAR#
EMP_SNO = #EMP_SNO:VARCHAR#
